column2: "Ana ɔwo ibotum edze nkwaba atwe dɛnkyɛmnyin? Anaa edze ahoma bɛkyekyer ne gyirama?"
"Ana ɔwo ibotum edze ntampehoma ahyɛ no hwen mu? Anaa edze kɔtɔkorba bɔbɔ n'afon mu?"
"Ana obedzi wo ntotɔserɛ pii? Anaa ɔbɛkasa kasa mberɛw akyerɛ wo?"
"Ana ɔnye wo bedzi ahyɛmu
column3: Dɛ ɔwo ebɛfa no ayɛ akowaa daa?"

column2: "Ana ɔwo enye no bɔgor dɛ mbrɛ enye anoma gor? Anaa ebɛkyer no ama wo mbabaawa?"
"Ana apofo ekuwekuw dze no bedzi bata? Anaa wɔbɛkyɛ no mu wɔ abatafo mu?"
"Ana edze dadze nsoɛ bɛhyɛ no wer ma
column3: Anaa edze nam mpeaa bɔwɔ ne tsir?"

column2: "Fa wo nsa ka no na hwɛ ɛ; Ɔwoara ibohu w'enyiwa mu
column3: nnkɛbɛn no bio."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: enyidado biara nnyi hɔ dɛ ibotum: Ana nnyɛ no hwɛ gyan ara mpo na ɔma obi hwe ase?"

column2: "Obiara n'enyi nnyɛ dzen dɛ ɔbɔbɔ no nkenyan; Na sɛ dɛm a
column3: woana koraa nye nyia obotum emi m'enyim gyina?"

column2: "Woana na ɔse ɔama me biribi
column3: ma menhyɛ no ananmu? Adze biara a ɔwɔ asaase do nyina no medze a."

column2: "Merennyɛ komm wɔ n'akwaa ho
column3: Na n'ahoɔdzen tum

column2: "Woana na ɔbɛpa no ho akataho? Woana na ɔbɛba ne menyiamfrɛ mbɔho no mu?"
"Woana na obobue n'enyim mbobow no? Ne se ho nyina yɛ hu."
"No ho abon dzendzen no nye n'ahohyehyɛ
column3: Wɔatotow mu dɛ wɔdze nsɔwanodze ayɛ."

column2: "Kor bɛn kor so dodow
column3: Ma mframa nntum mmfa hɔn ntamu."

column2: "Wɔfemfam ho nkorkor; Woesuo mu kor
column3: ma wɔtsetsew hɔn mu a ɔnnkɛyɛ."

column2: "No huntsii pa gya
column3: Na n'enyiwa tse dɛ adzekyee enyisoatsɛw."

column2: "Atsɛn a ɔdzɛw fi n'anomu pue
column3: Na gyansenama tutu fi mu."

column2: "Wusiw fi n'ahwentokura mu pue
column3: Dɛ mbrɛ ofi sɛn a oruhur na nkyɛkyɛr a ɔrehyew mu

column2: "Ahoɔdzen wɔ no kɔn mu
column3: Na hu huruhuruw wɔ n'enyim."

column2: "No honam a ɔsensɛn hɔ femfam ho twer: Wotsintsim no do
column3: wɔtwetwe a ɔnnyɛ."

column2: "N'akoma tsim hɔ dɛ ɔbo; Nyew
column3: otsim hɔ dɛ famu ewuyambo."

column2: "Sɛ ɔma noho do a
column3: akatakyi akoma tu: Na ahobow ntsi wɔbobɔ adam."

column2: "Sɛ obi dze afona tow no a
column3: onntum no; Nnyɛ peaa

column2: "Obu dadze dɛ nkyɛkyɛr
column3: Na boran dɛ duawui."

column2: "Egyen menaba remma onnguan: Tseabo mu abo yɛ no dɛ mburonan."
"Obu mpɔtsibaa dɛ mburonan: Ɔserew nkambaa no huuyɛ."
"N'ase tse dɛ ntankofɛr a n'ano yɛ ndam: Ɔtwe no dɛ ewuporow tseaseanam wɔ adɛtsebir do."
"Ɔyɛ bun ma ohur dɛ ɔsɛn mu: Ɔyɛ epo dɛ ngo."
"Ɔma ɔkwan hyerɛn dzi n'ekyir; Obi bobu bun no dɛ oehura gon."
"Ne saso nnyi asaase do a
column3: Na wɔammbɔ suro amma no."

column2: "Ɔhwɛ adze biara a ɔkrɔn: Ɔyɛ hen wɔ ahokyerɛ mba nyinara do."
